comments:
Build ID: I20061214-1445

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create Activity diagram. Create local post condition.
2. Create Activity and any Action in it. 
3. Create Constraint link from Action to Precondition
4. Close diagram and simply open it again. 
There are two local _pre_ conditions, one with link. Diagram is marked as changed. After diagram save it is not possible to open model (.uml) file. Details in editor shows exception

NOTE: PostCondition is replaced by PreCondition by the new GMF updater. General solution is described in the scr #188003
